name: Swamp Troll
skills: Athletics +8, Perception +1, Stealth +4 (+6 in swampy terrain)

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The swamp troll has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The troll regains 3 hit points at the start of its turn. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn’t function at the start of the troll’s next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn’t regenerate.

traits.name: Slimy
traits.desc: The swamp troll is covered swampy muck. Creatures attempting to grapple a swamp troll have disadvantage.

traits.name: Swamp Stride
traits.desc: The swamp troll ignores nonmagical difficult terrain caused by swamp water or vegetation.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The swamp troll makes one bite attack and two claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.
